review: I fell in love with Fire TV, user friendly, ease of set up, and so far works much better than Roku 3. Roku lasted 6 months set up was difficult, customer service not good, and Roku 3 no longer stays connected to wi-fi had to keep signing in every time we wanted to use and trying solve the problem was even worse, Roku in the trash and Fire TV is being used every night and the family loves it!

review: I truly love my Amazon Fire TV!  It is so small like a slice of bread and adorable!  The remote is tiny also but so intuitive you do not even need to look at it to use the remote.  I know actually use my prime video membership as I can now watch them on the big screen.  Another wonderful feature is using one the apps called Plex I can play my movies on my PC through the fire tv with no problem, not to mention music and pictures from my pc.  There is so much great content I can not give it enough praise, not just movies, games, fun apps it is a little entertainment box of wonder.  I got it when it was on sale one day for $79 but I would really not hesitate to  pay full price.  I highly recommend this!
